summary: This bill, the Renaming the National School Lunch Program Act of 2025, proposes to rename the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to the Jean E. Fairfax National School Lunch Act. The bill highlights Jean E. Fairfax's contributions to the program, citing her advocacy for equitable access and funding. It further details the historical context, emphasizing the original act's namesake's opposition to civil rights. The bill makes conforming amendments to numerous other laws, updating references to the program's name.
